input_text:
Job Title: Commercial Lines Account Manager

Location: Kansas City Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Administrative, Business Development, Consulting

Description:
ECCO Select is a talent acquisition and advisory consulting company, specializing in providing people, process, and technology solutions for our clients’ needs. We’re the talent behind the technology. To find out more about ECCO Position Title: Commercial Lines Account Manager Duration: Direct Hire Compensation: $65K + Location: Olathe KS 
Job Description:Our client, a well-established independent insurance agency, is actively looking to hire a Commercial Lines Account Manager for our office in Olathe, Kansas. Candidates must be positive, enthusiastic and customer focused. You will be responsible for providing outstanding customer service and sales support.
Requirements:5 years commercial account management experience.Strong knowledge of commercial lines insurance products.Understanding of commercial insurance underwriting, coverage, and rate analysis.Ability to organize, prioritize and self-manage workload.Strong organizational skills and proficiency with Microsoft suite of products.Sound, professional communication skills with both internal and external clients.Excellent documentation and follow-up skills.Active property and casualty license.Ability to work in a team environment, with a positive attitude, and willingness to help others.Effectively communicate with Producers regarding new and renewal business submissions.
Responsibilities: Respond to policy changes, billing questions, renewal reviews and other requests in a timely manner. Provide accurate and timely communication to customers through verbal and written communication. Prioritize and manage workflow to ensure efficient, timely, and accurate processing of transactions. Maintain accurate client files properly documenting conversations with insured and carrier underwriters. Submit and negotiate the best terms and conditions on new and renewal business. Enjoy a fast-paced environment. 
This is a full-time position with the possibility of a hybrid work schedule after 90 days. The company provides competitive compensation, health, dental and vision benefits, and company matched 401k after 1 year.
Our CommitmentWe would love to have you join our team! ECCO Select is committed to hiring and retaining a diverse workforce. ECCO Select’s policy is to provide equal opportunity to all people without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, ancestry, marital status, veteran status, age, disability, pregnancy, genetic information, citizenship status, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other legally protected category. 
Equal Employment Opportunity is The Law This Organization Participates in E-Verify

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

Provide accurate and timely communication to customers through verbal and written communication.

Maintain accurate client files properly documenting conversations with insured and carrier underwriters.
Submit and negotiate the best terms and conditions on new and renewal business.
